static void SetColumnImage (ListView list, int columnIndex, int imageIndex)
 Setup the given column of the listview to show the given image to the right of the text. If the image index is -1, any previous image is cleared.

Detailed Description

Wrapper for all native method calls on ListView controls.

Definition at line 1007 of file ObjectListView.cs.

Member Function Documentation

static void BrightIdeasSoftware.ListViewNative.ForceSubItemImagesExStyle ( ListView  list  )  [static]

Make sure the ListView has the extended style that says to display subitem images.

This method must be called after any .NET call that update the extended styles since they seem to erase this setting.

Parameters:
list The listview to send a message to

int  columnIndex,
int  imageIndex 
) [static]

Setup the given column of the listview to show the given image to the right of the text. If the image index is -1, any previous image is cleared.
